Articles.Content:
The KSC have long needed to rent fast boats to resque capsules landed in the sea due to no food remaining in the capsules.

This costs KSC very much, so they came up with another idea! Why not build the boats ourselfs?

KSC has paid an experienced boat mechanic (you) to make some prototypes, try to make the fastest boat possible and follow theese rules :

- Only jet engines

- Must have 1 cockpit ( no external seats )

- Must travel on the water, not fly above.

- No mods only (Except Mechjeb and FAR)

Good luck!

I managed to do 144.6m/s btw.

Leaderboard :

- 1 Darren9 260m/s

- 2 kola2 - 144.6m/s
